page.title: 06ASLEEP IN THE 20th CENTURY 2
page.content: station with a field of potatoes.The { {landscape}on the other side was a mess with tall grass full of nettles and wild flowers.When we came back up the lane we noticed a river of water coming down the lane.It was the man from the Severn Trent Water Board.He was testing the stand pipe.We noticed that there was a tiny{school}in the garden of a bungalow.On the front of the building it said Traditional School,erected in 1839.We went back to collect our questionaires on Wednesday .There were two Shetland ponies tied up on the{village}green by the{church} and we stroked them.We went to the boarding kennels and cattery and the lady invited us in.She had to shut her three dogs in a shed.Inside the house were some lovely kittens which the lady had saved from a rubbish tip.We enjoyed it.
